name: Palamar Teknoloji A.Ş.
description:
Palmate.ai is an intelligent, action-oriented AI platform that transforms customer interactions and streamlines operations for e-commerce, retail, travel and hospitality, and luxury brands. Going beyond simple Q&A, we deliver unique value by enabling AI-driven task automation, experience personalization, and business growth from a single unified platform.

Palmate.ai helps businesses enhance customer experience (CX), increase efficiency, and achieve measurable return on investment (ROI) through automation. Our platform can automate complex queries using features like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for real-time product information, Function Calling for order tracking and returns, recover abandoned carts, and provide personalized 24/7 support. It’s designed for seamless integration with existing systems such as e-commerce platforms like Shopify, Woocommerce and CRMs like Salesforce and HubSpot, and includes a low-code module that allows businesses to easily build custom workflows.
focus_areas: Intelligent Action & Integration: Offers action-oriented AI that automates tasks, personalizes CX, and drives growth
Clear ROI Focus: Boosts ROI through automation, better customer experience, and increased efficiency across all operations
CX Transformation: Grows sales in e-commerce, unifies retail channels, elevates travel stays, and delivers personalized luxury brand service
